sentences.en: accidents caused by trips or falls
sentences.cn: 由绊倒或摔倒引起的事故

sentences.en: England's footballers are back home after their ill-fated trip to Algeria.
sentences.cn: 英格兰足球队结束了倒霉的阿尔及利亚之行，回到了国内。

sentences.en: He has returned to South Africa from his long overseas trip.
sentences.cn: 他结束了漫长的海外旅行回到南非。

sentences.en: He made a round-trip to the terminal and back.
sentences.cn: 他到了终点，又折回来。

sentences.en: He tripped and fell .
sentences.cn: 他绊了一下，摔倒了。

sentences.en: He was unable to make the trip to accept the award.
sentences.cn: 他无法前去领奖。

sentences.en: I’m afraid you’ve had a wasted trip (= a trip in which you do not achieve your purpose ) . Mr Burgess has already left.
sentences.cn: 恐怕你是白来一趟了，伯吉斯先生已经走了。

sentences.en: If you enjoy outdoor activities, this is the trip for you.
sentences.cn: 如果你喜欢户外运动，这一旅行很适合你。

sentences.en: It would take three to six hours for a round trip.
sentences.cn: 往返行程需要3到6个小时。

sentences.en: It’s an 80-mile round trip (= a journey to a place and back again ) to Exeter.
sentences.cn: 到埃克塞特往返有80英里。

sentences.en: Ray and I ate our meal and reminisced about the trip.
sentences.cn: 雷和我吃着饭，回忆起那次旅行。

sentences.en: Roche was in two minds whether to make the trip to Oslo.
sentences.cn: 对于是否要去一趟奥斯陆，罗奇犹豫不决。

sentences.en: She rejected his advances during the trip to Cannes.
sentences.cn: 在去往戛纳的途中，她拒绝了他的挑逗。

sentences.en: The President's envoy set off on another diplomatic trip.
sentences.cn: 总统的使节开始了又一次外交之旅。

sentences.en: The round-trip fare to Havana is 550 Irish punts ($673).
sentences.cn: 去哈瓦那的往返票价是550爱尔兰镑（673美元）。

sentences.en: The trip gave me itchy feet and I wanted to travel more.
sentences.cn: 这次旅行让我渴望出游，想去更多的地方。

sentences.en: They started wittering on about their last trip to Provence.
sentences.cn: 他们开始喋喋不休地谈论上次的普罗旺斯之行。

sentences.en: This trip was not like his first triumphant return home in 1990.
sentences.cn: 这趟行程不同于他1990年的首次衣锦还乡。

sentences.en: tripped up on the last question.
sentences.cn: 在最后一个问题上犯了错误

sentences.en: Two lucky employees won a round-the-world trip.
sentences.cn: 两名幸运的雇员赢得一次环游世界的机会。

sentences.en: We'll make a trip by launch to White Island.
sentences.cn: 我们将乘汽艇到怀特岛。

sentences.en: You must be tuckered out after that bus trip across the country.
sentences.cn: 那次乘长途大巴遍游该国，你肯定累得精疲力竭。

words.tran_cn: 轻快的；流畅的；平稳地进行的
绊倒；远足；犯错误；轻快地走

phrases.tran_cn: 公务旅行，出差；商务旅行
往返旅行；环程旅行；[牌]大团圆

trans.tran_cn: 旅游，旅行，（因毒品产生）幻觉，绊倒
trans.tran_en: a visit to a place that involves a journey, for pleasure or a particular purpose
a visit to a place that involves a journey, for pleasure or a particular purpose

trans.tran_cn: 绊倒，轻快地走，产生幻觉
trans.tran_en: to hit something with your foot by accident so that you fall or almost fall
